generator: 1 { selected_frame(F) : frame(F, _) } 1. 1 { selected_motor(M) : motor(M, _) } 1. 1 { selected_battery(B) : battery(B, _) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check: if you're running HighTorque, you better have a LongLife battery or it's game over.
Don't try to slap a HighTorque motor on a Lightweight frame; that's just asking for a hardware crash.
LongLife batteries are basically bricks; you need a Reinforced frame to carry the load.
SmallCell is strictly for the Eco motor; anything else will just pop the circuit.
MediumCell doesn't have the juice for HighTorque, so keep them apart.

soft_constraints.description: Need to crunch the numbers and maximize that total endurance score so this drone stays airborne.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: total_endurance(E) :- selected_frame(F), frame(F, EF), selected_motor(M), motor(M, EM), selected_battery(B), battery(B, EB), E = EF + EM + EB. #maximize { E : total_endurance(E) }.
